body_html:
Maybe if popitem(key=None) == pop() just popitem -> get and "get" rid of pop ?

I don't think is what you want, since it does use HostMemory: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/split_v_op.cc#L383
but I'm not sure what mechanism @girving was thinking of.

Why not do it this way? You could force the int64 case only to the CPU.

body:
Maybe if popitem(key=None) == pop() just popitem -> get and "get" rid of pop ?

I don't think is what you want, since it does use HostMemory: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/split_v_op.cc#L383
but I'm not sure what mechanism @girving was thinking of.

Why not do it this way?  You could force the int64 case only to the CPU.
